profile.heading: Current Release Front-End Projects

profile.elavator_pitch: I am an IT Engineer, turned Full-Stack JavaScript Developer. I can create, enhance, debug websites. I love front-end user-interfaces and server-side code. From data-validation, user-sign-on, data-encryption to progressive-enhancement of web-pages, I got the skills you need to make your vision come alive..
